pkgmetadata.longdescription: Linear Trend Segmentation and Point Anomaly Detection // Performs the detection of point anomalies and linear trend changes for univariate time series by implementing the bottom-up unbalanced wavelet transformation proposed by H. Maeng and P. Fryzlewicz (2019) http://personal.lse.ac.uk/maengh/. The estimated number and locations of the change-points are returned with the piecewise-linear estimator for signal.
